creator: Alex Chen
description: Independent musician and open-source developer. Creator of the 'Midnight Waves' album series and contributor to digital rights tooling.

goals.description: License music catalog to streaming platforms with 70/30 royalty split favoring the estate
goals.constraints: Prefer non-exclusive licenses. 70% to estate, 30% to platform. All major platforms should have access.

goals.description: Fund open-source projects aligned with digital rights, maximum $5,000 per project
goals.constraints: Only fund projects with active maintainers. Maximum $5,000 per project. Focus on digital rights, privacy, and creative commons tooling.

goals.description: Maintain personal website for 10 years, then archive to IPFS
goals.constraints: Keep alexchen.dev running for 10 years post-trigger. After 10 years, create a static archive on IPFS and let the domain lapse.

goals.description: All intellectual property transitions to CC0 (public domain) after 20-year sunset
goals.constraints: Non-negotiable. All IP, music, code, and writing enters public domain at sunset.
